body.name: Lush Decor Ticking Stripe Bedspread Black Vintage Chic Farmhouse Style Lightweight 3 Piece Set, Queen
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 10 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Feminine, Vintage Chic style bedspread with fabric and fill content made from 100% polyester - lightweight bedding ideal for summer and spring or layering.
Lush Décor Ticking Stripe Ruffle Skirt bedspread has a long, beautiful ruffled edge detail and is the perfect addition to your farmhouse or Vintage Chic style bedroom decor.
Elegant and delicate ruffle edge give you a charming and pretty bedding set.
3 piece set includes a queen size bedspread (80”H x 60”W + 30” drop) and 2 matching shams (20”H x 26”W + 2” ruffle).
Due to the delicate nature of the design, these items are dry clean only.
body.description: This bedspread set is very trendy. The classic pinstripes printed on the front never go out of style, and the ruffled edges are very chic and stylish. Two matching pillow shams included. Update your master or guest bedroom with this fashionable design.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Dry Clean Highly Recommended. Machine Wash Cold, Mesh Bag, Similar Colors, Gentle Cycle. Use Only Non-Chlorine Bleach When Needed. Tumble Dry Low, Light Iron If Needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lush Décor is a brand of Triangle Home Fashions. From its creation, Triangle Home Fashions has focused on three core values: design, quality and innovation. Since that time, it has grown and evolved into a home textiles company that values and nurtures its relationships with its customers. We are challenged every day is to design and develop the best in home textiles, offering unique fabrics with incredible detailed surface treatments so our customers always feel that what they are buying is on trend, long lasting and most importantly a great value.

This Ruffle Skirt Bedspread Set is sure to impress all your guests with the incredible amount of special details that are incorporated in the design. Its generous size will create the beautiful overhang look for a more glamorous feel. From a child's bedroom to your own master bedroom, this Ruffle Skirt Bedspread Set is ideal for use for all ages. Give your daughter a lovely first big girl bed, or update your teenager's bedroom into a princess palace. This set would even look fabulous in dorm rooms, guest bedrooms and master bedrooms. Available in soft neutral colors to create a calming atmosphere, features a stunning, fashionable look to brighten any bedroom or dorm room. Because it is lightweight, it is ideal for layering and for use during the spring and summer. In warmer climates, it can be used year round. Multiple styles of ruffles will appeal to all tastes. Choose from: Solid color that is soft and luxurious feeling and ideal for layering Classic pinstripes printed on the front that never go out of styleHand tucking detail on crinkle Microfiber with an elegant ruffled edgeAnd a feminine Shabby Chic French Country look with four layers of ruffles

This simple yet stylish bedspread set comes complete with a chic bedspread and two matching pillow shams (only one pillow sham in the twin size). The long and flowing ruffled portion drapes beautifully over the bed and pools onto the floor creating a gorgeous and elegant look for your bedroom. This bedspread set is made with soft brushed poly. It is incredibly soft to the touch. Due to the delicate nature of the ruffles, this set including the shams should be dry cleaned only. It is perfect for any bedroom where you want to add feminine style, or want an affordable set to complete your farmhouse, shabby chic, French Country, traditional or minimalist bedroom design.
This set is available in your choice of twin, twin XL, full, queen and king sizes in several colors. The variety of neutral and trendy color options makes it easy to match with any bedroom décor.

This bedspread set comes complete with a chic bedspread and two matching pillow shams (only one pillow sham in the twin size). All bedspreads have a 30 inch drop. The long and flowing ruffled portion drapes beautifully over the bed and pools onto the floor creating a gorgeous, feminine look for your bedroom. Create your dream farmhouse, shabby chic, French Country, traditional or minimalist bedroom design with these affordable bedspread sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I will have to add a video of how cute this bedspread made a small bedroom look like it was professionally put together. It literally makes it look one of a kind, very well-made lightweight not heavy to be under, but just right weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fabric, skirt length, perfect color
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful long drop (30”) bedspread. I’m thrilled with it. I have no doubt it’s fragile so treat it as such. This hides the tubs I have hidden under my queen size, four poster bed. I love 💕 the extra space under the bed that no one else sees. I read a lot of reviews and tips before laundering and placing on my bed. That is, wash on delicate in cold water without anything else in the washer. Then dry on warm setting without anything else in dryer. I had no wrinkles whatsoever and didn’t iron it. This bedspread couldn’t be more perfect. I put a Shabby Chic brand comforter with pink roses on beige background on top. It’s lovely. 💕💕💕Mine doesn’t puddle, it comes to 2” from floor. The trick is to measure and remeasure before you buy it. I bought a faux leather foot stool for under $40 to step on when getting into my bed. The bed was my Mother’s so it is important to me to keep it, so beautiful. 💕💕💕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, versatile, probably too fragile for heavy wear
reviews.reviewText: This is the blush ticking stripe on a Victorian half-tester bed. Arrived very wrinkled, which light dryer tumble and pressing has begun to address. The ticking stripes are printed rather than woven into the fabric, so expect this. Very soft and lightweight, floaty fabric. Batting inside the top layer of the bedspread, so this likely wouldn't be up to a heavy duty wash/spin cycle. I'm going to handle this gently, -- as others have mentioned, it doesn't seem likely to be super durable.For the price, well worth it, if you don't mind maintaining with a little TLC. A pretty, versatile spread to coordinate with quilts or, as here, an eiderdown. Good for layering. I liked it well enough that I ordered another in neutral/natural.Note: I liked this so well I attempted to order a second one in neutral/natural, but I was sent a charcoal gray instead. I have now seen other reviews where this was a problem (including one reviewer who tried three times and repeatedly got the wrong color). So ... caution when ordering "neutral." It may not be what you get.Edit to add: Liked so well I bought another one in tan ticking stripe. So far, the first one I bought has held up extremely well. Washed on delicate cycle, went through dryer alone and came out with minimal wrinkles and top batting in place. With a bit of care and thought, these do well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We had to elevate the bed due to length of cover, excellent quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Quality and Look for a GREAT price.
reviews.reviewText: BUY IT, it's FABULOUS! Where do I begin? I honestly wasn't sure what to expect with the gray ticking stripe bedding but I had high hopes and let me tell you I was not disappointed. It arrived quickly, I will tell you that it is very wrinkled upon opening (obviously), but after I washed it on my gentle cycle, and dried on low heat I laid it over my bed and steamed the wrinkles right out. The 30" drop is truly 30" and fits my tall bed perfectly. I was surprised to find that the topper had a soft fluffy interfacing it it. I assumed it would just be a thin layer of material like the "skirting" but it's not. I adore this set and plan on getting one for our guest bedroom and another color for our master suite. Oh I will mention the "gray" appears to be more of a greige to my eyes, but with in on my gray bed it definitely looks gray. Regardless of the gray or greige, it's beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the bedding , however it slides right off . It’s not sturdy . Made cheaply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First review ever here- these are amazing! I have 4 different ones and plan to buy more. They are soft and wash up incredibly making them extremely durable. I plan to buy more for our lake house. Next part is, it makes it so east for my kids to make their beds. Pull up the sheet and then this and they’re done! I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This twin XL bedspread is so cheaply made. The black stripes don't match from top to skirt. Very very thin. Very wrinkled!! Looks terrible on my bed. Have to return it.I would not recommend to anyone! Does not look nothing like photo shown!
A very pretty set ,but it is definitely lightweight you need a blanket with it but for spring and summer it will be perfect !I was lucky enough to get it on sale at a great price

reviews.reviewTitle: Measure your bed height carefully so you know exactly where it will hit the floor .
reviews.reviewText: I loved this bedspread but unfortunately didn’t fit my height of bed. If my mattress was 2 inches taller it would of been perfect. The skirt was the only thing that didn’t fit my mattress height. Measure your needed height to make sure the skirt part hangs where you want it.
